sentences: Terje Andersen (born 12 May 1975), known professionally as Cyrus, is a Norwegian musician best known as the guitarist of the black metal band Susperia.
Cyrus started his career in 1997 when he went playing in a band called Seven Sins with ex-Dimmu Borgir drummer Tjodalv.
In 2000, Cyrus went playing guitar with Satyricon for a worldwide tour.
He was in Satyricon for two years as session member.
In 2009, he became a session guitarist of thrash/black metal band Sarke.
In 2011, with Susperia he released first Susperia's single "Nothing Remains".
Cyrus recently played guitar in Susperia (as full-time member) and Sarke (as session member) and bass guitar in Dimmu Borgir (as session member).
